eg.edittools

Class TextSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.edittools.TextSearch

  • public class TextSearch
extends java.lang.Object
    The search of text or words in the FileDocument that is currently viewed in the main editor area

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextSearch()

      Replaces text selected in the document with the specified string

        public void setRequireWord(boolean b)

        Parameters:
        b - the boolen value

      • resetSearchToStart

        public void resetSearchToStart()
        Resets the search to the start of the document

      • searchText

        public void searchText(java.lang.String toSearch)
        Searches and selects the specified string in the text area of the currently set document. A search starts from the position of the cursor and repeated searches each start from the last match position.
        Parameters:
        toSearch - the string to search

      • replaceSel

        public void replaceSel(java.lang.String replaceWith)
        Replaces text selected in the document with the specified string
        Parameters:
        replaceWith - the string
